sense.gloss: tie-dye, tie-dyeing
aperture (e.g. camera, iris of the eye), aperture stop, stop
contraction, squeezing, choke
to wring (towel, rag), to squeeze
to squeeze (fruit to extract juice), to press, to extract, to milk, to express milk
to rack (one's brains), to strain (one's voice)
to extort, to exploit
to chew out, to reprimand severely, to rake over the coals, to give a sound scolding, to tell someone off, to scold, to rebuke
to drill into, to train
to narrow down (one's focus), to whittle down
to gather up (curtain, etc.), to tighten (drawstring)
to stop down (lens)
to turn down (e.g. radio)
to bend (bow), to draw
to hold down, to constrict, to immobilize
refinement, narrowing-down
to squeeze, to wring out
to narrow down, to refine
to strangle, to constrict
death by hanging (punishment in the ritsuryō system)
wet towel (supplied at table), hot, moistened hand towel
to draw (a bow) to the limit
to pull tight, to squeeze tight, to clasp
to strain (voice)
pinioning, binding arms behind the back
to be strangled, to be constricted

sdata.j: わたしからはこれ↑以上↑↓いじょう↓お↑金↑↓かね↓は↑絞↑↓しぼ↓り↑取↑↓と↓れませんよ。
sdata.e: You can't wring any more money from me.

sdata.j: この↑明↑↓あか↓るさで↑絞↑↓しぼ↓りはどのくらいですか。
sdata.e: What is the correct aperture in this light?

sdata.j: こってりあいつの↑油↑↓あぶら↓を↑絞↑↓しぼ↓ってやった。
sdata.e: I gave him a stern talking to.

sdata.j: ↑座席↑↓ざせき↓ベルトをお↑絞↑↓しぼり↓めになり、タバコはご↑遠慮↑↓えんりょ↓↑下↑↓くだ↓さいませ。
sdata.e: Please fasten your seat belts, and kindly refrain from smoking.

sdata.j: ↑罪人↑↓ざいにん↓は↑絞首↑↓こうしゅ↓↑台↑↓だい↓に↑送↑↓おく↓られた。
sdata.e: The criminal was sent to the gallows.

sdata.j: ↑死体↑↓したい↓を↑解剖↑↓かいぼう↓した↑結果↑↓けっか↓↑絞殺↑↓こうさつ↓と↑判明↑↓はんめい↓した。
sdata.e: The postmortem showed that she had been strangled.

sdata.j: ↑私↑↓わたし↓はオレンジジュースを↑絞↑↓しぼ↓った。
sdata.e: I squeezed the juice out of the oranges.

sdata.j: ↑小↑↓しょう↓↑羊↑↓ひつじ↓を↑盗↑↓ぬす↓んで↑絞首刑↑↓こうしゅけい↓になるくらいなら↑親↑↓おや↓↑羊↑↓ひつじ↓を↑盗↑↓ぬす↓んで↑絞首刑↑↓こうしゅけい↓になるほうがましだ。
sdata.e: As well be hanged for a sheep as a lamb.

sdata.j: ↑上手↑↓じょうず↓な↑弁護士↑↓べんごし↓はひとつの↑鍵↑↓かぎ↓となる↑証拠↑↓しょうこ↓に↑的↑↓まと↓を↑絞↑↓しぼ↓る。
sdata.e: A good lawyer will always zero in on a key piece of evidence.

sdata.j: ↑真綿↑↓まわた↓で↑首↑↓くび↓を↑絞↑↓し↓めるような↑言↑↓い↓い↑方↑↓かた↓をしないで、お↑願↑↓ねが↓いだから、もっとはっきり↑言↑↓い↓ってくれない。
sdata.e: Stop trying to make us follow all these subtle clues. I wish you would say what you want to say more clearly.
